Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.components

Class Game

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.components.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
GamePreparation, RealGame
public abstract class Game
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Game is an abstract class that partially manages the activities linked to GamePreparation and RealGame phases. It contains method that many GUI-components classes contain. Its abstract method is draw that is draw. This class manages the turn change during the game both when player choose where to place their workers and during RealGame phase.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • twoDArrayToList

      protected static java.util.List<JCellButton> twoDArrayToList​(JCellButton[][] twoDArray)
      This method creates a list of CellButton having as input the common Board, defined as a two-dimensional array.
      Parameters:
      twoDArray - contains reference to the Board used in game.
      Returns:
      a List of JCellButton containing all the button that are in the two-dimensional array given as parameter.

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn()
      This method manages the change of the turn. At the moment in which begins a specific player turn, the player is notified about that through a sound alert. All the opponents can also see that is an opponent's turn.

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard​(java.lang.String board)
      This is a simple setter of the Board.
      Parameters:
      board - is a String JSon-format which contains information about all the cell involved in the match board.

    • paintComponent

      protected void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This method override the paintComponent method of the JPanel class. It adds to the method of the super class a background image, used in the JPanel of the class.
      Overrides:
      paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
      Parameters:
      g - contains a reference to the component we want to set the background image

    • drawCommonBoard

      protected void drawCommonBoard()
      This protected method manages all the activities linked to the draw of the Board, used in GamePreparation and RealGame phases. This method handles players' nickname column, the currentGame, it also set info and continue buttons and deals with the print of the BoardScreen
